Reviews.Title: HP Pavilion DV7-6c27cl is great!
Reviews.Author: L. Degelman
Reviews.Content: I had the criteria of 17" screen, high speed, and graphics abilities to develop Windows 8 Phone Apps and Windows 8 Metro Apps.  This computer had it all, including 8 GB RAM and more than adequate HD space at 673 GB.  All my former Windows 7 applications now run on the Windows 8 upgrade that I installed two days after my purchase of this computer.  More than satisfactory!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: BrightMoose
Reviews.Content: Soon after receiving the unit, I noticed that it had a faulty battery and was not charging. It was not being detected by the HP notebook;. I ordered a replacement which solved this problem.A couple days later, i noticed the wireless function would work some time and some time it wouldn't. i tried a few things to fix it including installing new drivers. I later ran other checks including an HP diagnostic check which revealed that it could not detect a WLAN module which meant that the module had stop communicating. I returned the unit for a refund after about 10 days of headaches

Reviews.Title: happy to get the last Win 7
Reviews.Author: Terry Douglas Martin
Reviews.Content: Rec'd the laptop in excellent condition. the strange thing was the carton had the SKU blacked out, and there was a Sam's Club label visable.  also visable was a Do Not Scan label, SKU intact. H/p verified that the computer had not been started before, and registered the warranty.  I have used the laptop for less than five hours so far (01/03/2013) and all is good.  I like the computers' features.
